A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend application connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Service browsing functionality displaying available cleaning services
Detailed service pages showing descriptions, pricing, and duration
Booking system allowing users to schedule cleaning services
User interface for checking the status of booked services
Contact page providing phone number and email address for customer service
Inquiry form for users to submit service-related questions
Responsive website design with azure mist background color
Dark slate blue color applied to interactive components and headers
Package.json configured with `install:all` script for FE & BE dependencies
Package.json configured with `dev` script to start FE & BE concurrently
Database schema supporting service listings, bookings, and inquiries
API endpoints for retrieving service data and submitting bookings
API endpoint for handling service status requests
